original_title: Christian Howes & The Horacio Icasto Quartet: Live in Madrid
overview: Christian Howes brings his explosive jazz violin sound to this full length concert, recorded live in Madrid, with The Horacio Icasto Quartet in 2007.
tagline: Nowadays there are four or five really good jazz violinist, but there is nobody better than this guy. - Les Paul
title: Christian Howes & The Horacio Icasto Quartet: Live in Madrid
